name: WebGLRenderingContext.depthRange
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.depthRange() method of the WebGL API specifies the depth range mapping from normalized device coordinates to window or viewport coordinates.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'depthRange' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDepthRangef' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
